imdb.plot outline: With the mooted October deadline for the recapture of Mosul from the Islamic State rapidly approaching, Kurdish Peshmerga on Sunday launched an offensive to push closer to Mosul from the Iraq's southeast, gaining control of another vital supply line.
imdb.title: Attacked by ISIS on the Road to Mosul
akas: Attacked by ISIS on the Road to Mosul (United States)
plot: With the mooted October deadline for the recapture of Mosul from the Islamic State rapidly approaching, Kurdish Peshmerga on Sunday launched an offensive to push closer to Mosul from the Iraq's southeast, gaining control of another vital supply line.
